Name: Cursor - by Mr iLyn.
About the game: Hi there, this is my first game I've ever created. Test your reaction and dodging skills and try to get as much score as possible! You are moving the cursor with your mouse, while the enemy tries to catch you. Dodge his bullets and survive as long as possible! Collect coins to get extra score and use upgrades to withstand the growing level of your Enemy. What's the highest score you can reach ? FEATURES: - different modes - endless game - enemy will upgrade and get bigger, stronger and faster! - you can upgrade too
